channel.title: Home on Kutch Sanitary Store
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Kutch Sanitary Store

item.title: Simple Values
item.description: Our business serves the city of Bhuj with a strong emphasis on reliability. Be it faucets, bathtubs, showers, or one of the thousands of sanitaryware items that we stock, we have got you covered and will help you build your home or office faster.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Ashanand Barva Ashanand Barva not only laid the foundation of the business but carefully nurtured it for decades by dedicatedly providing a wide range of sanitaryware products to the Kutch region. Rajesh Barva Rajesh Barva’s natural acumen has been with connecting with people and managing logistics. He’s excellent at troubleshooting practical challenges as well. Next time you are looking for excellent tile fittings for your home, you know whom to reach out to!

item.title: Comprehensive Choices
item.description: Over 50+ years we have mindfully partnered with leading sanitaryware manufactures and can offer a wide range of premium products of the brands that interest you. Check out the Brands we partner with to learn more!
